body: Hi Mostapha, how can i do "to create a dummy zone around your room and solve the adjacency between them"? I'm trying to build two zones with two attached surfaces but is not correct and i'm trying to build two zones with the same surface but is not correct. I can't use adiabatic surface because in this wall there is a door, and in open studio if I set adiabatic wall, it take off the door from the wall. thank you very much and sorry for my english [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/u66VLCd0ARAB-lzh9DZnGaEI6TrFYXH945v4yqA5oJTm1sAfjJCBqYF7eiiK5c8aR877Y-5CTrgRZ1sKIyRAGurjFVuTQXjg/sunexposed.png)
